name: Alpha Mike Foxtrot
description:
HOOAH! Lock and Load Soldier! Get ready for the latest in Virtual Reality Team-Based Tactical Combat.

DESIGNED specifically for VR, Alpha Mike Foxtrot (AMF) delivers the goods for the Advanced FPS Player. Put on your headset and engage in all-out warfare with your friends (or enemies) around the globe.

POWERED by the HTC VIVE, AMF features real-as-hell controls to deliver a true TACTICOOL experience.

TAKE ACTION NOW! No mouse & keyboard are supported, so you'll need to bring your A-Game. Move, Shoot, Duck and Take Cover just like in a real-life combat scenario.

Spray n' Pray ain't gonna cut it. AMF requires true marksmanship skills, making each kill oh so satisfying. This game is designed for you Big Boys and Girls who crave that in-your-face intensity of VR PvP Close Quarters Combat. Come check out AMF today! That's an order!

AMF FEATURES:

- A Room Scale / Standing Experience
- Competitive Game Modes: Team Death Match / Free For All / Bomb Activation-Deactivation objectives. Booyah!
- Diverse, Responsive and Immersive indoor/outdoor environments
- An Arsenal of Rifles, SMGs, Sniper Rifles, Pistols plus knives, grenades, and yep, night vision
- A Built-in Dedicated Shooting Range facility for target practice and mischief
- Dedicated global servers allowing up to 8 badasses to engage simultaneously
- Realistic physics, explosions, and ambient sounds
- Fast respawns per round emulate arcade-styled game play (nobody likes waiting...)
- Full body presence (See your whole, full-geared body in VR)
- Comprehensive Tutorial for you new recruits (RTFM!)
- And one more thing: Talk smack through in-game voice chat and finish off your opponents with the satisfying battle cry, "ALPHA MIKE FOXTROT!" AKA "Adios, Mother F*@#&$!" ^^
